title: Training the AI Assistant
content: You can train this assistant by adding .json files to `chatwidget/data/`. Each file should be a list or object with a `title` and `content` key. These entries are automatically included in the assistant’s knowledge base.

title: Example Entry
content: {"title": "About Matt", "content": "Matt Raynor is a full-stack web developer and inspirational creator who rebuilt his life after a devastating injury. He is available for freelance work."}

title: Who Is Matt?
content: Matt Raynor is a quadriplegic developer, writer, and artist who taught himself how to code using a two-stylus setup. His story of recovery and skill-building is truly inspiring.

title: Hiring Matt
content: Matt specializes in Django and React development, builds fully deployed production-grade web apps, and has a strong design sensibility. You can view his portfolio at www.matthewraynor.com/portfolio/.

title: How Can I Help?
content: You can help by donating, hiring Matt, spreading the word, or contributing to the chatbot’s knowledge base.
